Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
30 35 30 80 100 35 310
#398 0' 5.1"
0.22 lbs. 		Gas Pokémon When exposed to a strong wind, a Gastly's gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Levitate 12 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
1 Ghastly Guard 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats in Eerie Fog.
10 Bad Dreams 11 Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
25 Wispy Form 12 The Pokémon creates a eerie fog when it's hit by an attack.
40 Insomnia 10 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
55 Lifelink 2 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
70 Infiltrator 16 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
85 Shadow Tag 83 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
100 Shadow Shield 81 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 04 Insomnia 10 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 18 Mimicry 22 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 23 Shadow Tag 83 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
Disc 25 Levitate 12 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Bad Dreams 11 Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
Cursed Body 11 May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
Frisk 1 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Fumigate 77 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Ghastly Guard 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats in Eerie Fog.
Gooey 32 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Infiltrator 16 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Klutz -25 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Lifelink 2 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
Misty Mane 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Misty Terrain.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Shadow Shield 81 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Slow Start -94 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Terrorize 77 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unstable Isotope 32 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats under Gravity.
Volatile 69 Boosts the Special Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Wispy Form 12 The Pokémon creates a eerie fog when it's hit by an attack.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
